A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed The Last Jedi.\nIt subverted some expectations\, which has clearly annoyed some\, but I think it was far more enjoyable for it.  And there were a few plot holes and creative liberties but let's be honest here: that's true of every film\, and we all forgive the films that we enjoyed regardless. And the bottom line is: I left the cinema thinking \"that was great!\".\nGreat visuals\, characters with actual depth and complexity\, enjoyable action and humorous moments that were genuinely funny.  Highly recommended!
